activeSkill.title: Mine Field
activeSkill.description: For the next 6 seconds, leave a trail of permanent land mines behind youn, each dealing 150 damage and applying Burn in a large area when triggered.

activeSkill.title: Tornado
activeSkill.description: Summon a tornado at a random enemy's position that moves randomly, causing 80 damage and applying Dazed to enemies caught within every 0,5 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Death Vortex
activeSkill.description: Summon a dark vortex at a random enemy's position that moves randomly, applying Doom to enemies caught within.

activeSkill.title: Arance Power
activeSkill.description: Empower you and all your nearby allies, increasing the multi cast modifier by 50% for 10.0 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Magic Missiles
activeSkill.description: Quickly fire 30 magic missiles in front of you, piercing enemies causing 30 damage and applying Brittle: +1% cooldowns and 3 damage per hit for 5 seconds with each hit.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Disc
activeSkill.description: Hurls an arcane disc that is bound to you in the target direction, causing 480 damage and applying 50% Exposed to targets hit. The disc returns to you at the end of its range, causing damage to enemies again on its way back.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Sparks
activeSkill.description: Fire a total of 8 projectiles that move randomly, dealing 160 damage and applying 40% Exposed to enemies caught in their path.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Beam
activeSkill.description: Fire a continuous beam in the direction you are aiming at, dealing up to 750 damage to enemies in the area.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Assault
activeSkill.description: Use arcane energy to hit enemies in front of you, causing 400 damage and applying 200% Vulnerable

activeSkill.title: Arcane Rift
activeSkill.description: For the next 6 seconds, leave a trail of arcane energy behind you, applying 10% Exposed every 1 second to enemies standing on your path.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Blade
activeSkill.description: Strike enemies with a powerful arcane blade, causing 500 damage and an extra 50 damage per stack of Exposed or Vulnerable on the target.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Shield
activeSkill.description: Creates an arcane shield around you, absorbing up to 30 damage and lasting for 15 seconds. When the shield expires, it causes 30 times the damage absorbed as damage to enemies around you.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Orb
activeSkill.description: Launch a large orb in the direction you are aiming at, which applies 80% Exposed to targets it passes through. Additionally, this orb quickly fires additional projectiles in all directions, each dealing 70 damage per hit.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Conjuration
activeSkill.description: Summon a total of 10 arcane pillars away from you, that quickly converge to your position, dealing 110 damage and applying 50% Exposed to enemies in their path.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Overload
activeSkill.description: Spin your weapon around you, applying 80% Exposed to all nearby enemies, and firing 20 arcane missiles at random positions around you, dealing 250 damage per missile to enemies hit.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Explosion
activeSkill.description: Summon a large arcane explosion at your position, dealing 350 damage and applying 60% Exposed.

activeSkill.title: Slash
activeSkill.description: Slashes targets in the direction you are aiming at, causing 150 damage and applying 30% Vulnerable.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Slash
activeSkill.description: Fire an arcane slash forward, dealing 70 damage and applying 40% Exposed.

activeSkill.title: Arcane Missiles
activeSkill.description: While the attack is channeled, you automatically fire 2 arcane missiles that seek a random nearby target, dealing 60 damage in a small area.

activeSkill.title: Chromatic Bolt
activeSkill.description: Fires a ricocheting shot in the direction you are aiming at, that bounces around between targets until it has traveled a total of 60 meters, dealing 50 damage and applying a Random Damaging Negative Effect

activeSkill.title: Bloodlust
activeSkill.description: Empower you and all your nearby allies, increasing the movement speed modifier by an additional 20% and cast frequency modifier by an additional 40% for 10 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Chaos Bolt
activeSkill.description: Fires a chaos bolt in the direction you are aiming at, piercing through enemies in a line, causing a random amount of damage between 1 and 240. Two secondary bolts are released on impact, each applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect.

activeSkill.title: Chaos Bomb
activeSkill.description: Throws a chaos bomb in an area in front of you, causing a random amount of damage between 1 and 1000 and applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect.

activeSkill.title: Chaos Golem
activeSkill.description: Summon 1 chaos golem to fight for you. A maximum of 3 units can be active at any time. Chaos Golems deal a random amount of damage between 1 and 2000 and inflict Stun and a Random Powerful Negative Effect in a large area.

activeSkill.title: Death Claw
activeSkill.description: Conjures a chaotic death claw at the feet of a random enemy, causing a random amount of damage between 1 and 1000 and applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect.

activeSkill.title: Chaos Wave
activeSkill.description: Releases a wave of chaos around you, dealing random damage between 1 and 400 and applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect.

activeSkill.title: Chaos Totem
activeSkill.description: Summon a chaos totem at your position for 15.0 seconds, which continuously fires chaos bolts at the nearest enemy, dealing a random amount of damage between 1 and 300 and applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect. A maximum of 3 totems may be active at any one time.

activeSkill.title: Manifestation of Chaos
activeSkill.description: Release a total of 4 projectiles that move randomly, dealing a random amount of damage between 1 and 300 and applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect to enemies caught in their path.

activeSkill.title: Unchained Chaos
activeSkill.description: Release a chain of chaos at a random enemy, causing a random amount of damage between 1 and 290, applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect, and then jumping anywhere from 0 to 10 additional times to nearby targets if possible.

activeSkill.title: Chaotic Missile
activeSkill.description: Throws a chaotic missile forward hitting enemies in a line, causing a random amount of damage between 1 and 80 and applying a Random Powerful Negative Effect every time it goes through enemies. There is a 50% chance that the missile will come back to you.

activeSkill.title: Frost Bolt
activeSkill.description: Fires an icy projectile in the direction you are aiming at, piercing through enemies in a line, causing 300 damage and inflicting 20% Slow.

activeSkill.title: Glacier
activeSkill.description: Summons a large glacier over a random enemy, dealing 900 damage and pushing enemies back, inflicting 2 seconds Stun and 60% Slow.

activeSkill.title: Ice Vortex
activeSkill.description: Summon an icy vortex at a random enemy's position that for 3 seconds quickly applies 5% Slow and then explodes, dealing 25 damage per stack of Slow or Paralysis on the target

activeSkill.title: Blizzard
activeSkill.description: Conjures a blizzard over a random enemy, hitting enemies 25 times, causing a total of 875 damage and applying 5% Slow with every hit.

activeSkill.title: Frozen Warhammer
activeSkill.description: Conjures a frozen warhammer to slam targets in front of you, dealing 300 damage and an extra 15 damage per stack of Slow or Paralysis on the target. Applies 10% Slow.

activeSkill.title: Poison Bolt
activeSkill.description: Fires 5 poisonous projectiles in the direction you are aiming at, inflicting Poison: 130 damage over 15 seconds to enemies in a large area.

activeSkill.title: Poison Bomb
activeSkill.description: Throws a poison bomb at a random enemy, dealing 100 damage and applying Poison instantly to targets hit, leaving a poison puddle in the ground, inflicting Poison: 450 damage over 15 seconds to enemies in a large area.

activeSkill.title: Poison Cloud
activeSkill.description: Summons a moving poison cloud that applies 1 stacks of Poison: 400 damage over 15 seconds every 0.5 seconds to enemies caught within.

activeSkill.title: Acid Rain
activeSkill.description: Throw a projectile in an arc in the direction you are aiming at, raining acid on enemies in its trajectory, applying Rot: 100 damage over 15 seconds, spread on death with each rain drop.

activeSkill.title: War Tiger
activeSkill.description: Summon 2 War Tigers to fight for you. A maximum of 6 units can be active at any time.

activeSkill.title: Battle Moose
activeSkill.description: Summon 1 battle moose to fight for you. A maximum of 8 units can be active at any time.

activeSkill.title: Bestial Wrath
activeSkill.description: Empower your nearby allies only, increasing movement speed modifier by 40% and multi cast modifier by 70% for 10.0 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Putrid Hounds
activeSkill.description: Summon 2 putrid hounds to fight for you, applying 3% Weakness when they attack. A maximum of 7 units can be active at any time.

activeSkill.title: Festering Strike
activeSkill.description: Causes 30 damage and applies Poison: 90 damage over 15 seconds to all enemies around you.

activeSkill.title: Contagion
activeSkill.description: Causes a large explosion at your position, applying Rot: 1200 damage over 15 seconds, spread on death to nearby enemies.

activeSkill.title: Path of Decay
activeSkill.description: For the next 6 seconds, leave a trail of decay behind you, applying Poison: 120 damage over 15 seconds every 1 seconds to enemies standing in your path.

activeSkill.title: Cobra Totem
activeSkill.description: Summon a cobra totem at your position for 10 seconds, which continuously fires poison bombs at the nearest enemy, dealing 150 initial damage and applying 1 stacks of Poison: 500 damage over 15 secondsto enemies in an area. A maximum of 4 totems may be active at any one time.

activeSkill.title: Venomous Strike
activeSkill.description: Slashes targets in front of you causing 120 damage and applying 2 stacks of Poison: 220 damage over 15 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Fire Bolt
activeSkill.description: Shoots a fiery projectile in the direction you are aiming at, causing 200 damage and applying 6 stacks of Burn: 300 damage over 8 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Meteor
activeSkill.description: Hurls a large meteor at a random enemy, dealing 400 damage and strong pushback, inflicting 6 seconds Stun and Burn: 200 damage over 8 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Flame Wave
activeSkill.description: Causes a large explosion at your position, dealing 150 damage to nearby enemies, applying 1 stacks of Burn: 400 damage over 8 seconds, 2 seconds Stun and pushing them back.

activeSkill.title: Fire Wall
activeSkill.description: Creates a wall of fire at the feet of a random enemy, applying Burn: 480 damage over 8 seconds to any enemy that crosses it.

activeSkill.title: Meteor Shower
activeSkill.description: 15 small meteorites hit the ground around a random enemy, dealing 100 damage per meteorite and inflicting 5 seconds Stun and Burn: 200 damage over 8 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Conflagrate
activeSkill.description: Causes all enemies in a large area around you that are currently afflicted with Burn or Melting to explode, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies.

activeSkill.title: Lava Shield
activeSkill.description: Creates 3 orbs that rotate around you for 6 seconds, exploding on contact with enemies, causing 200 damage and applying Melting in a large area.

activeSkill.title: Fire Walk
activeSkill.description: For the next 6 seconds, leave a trail of fire behind you, applying 1 stacks of Burn: 60 damage over 8 seconds every 1 seconds to enemies standing in the fire.

activeSkill.title: Flamethrower
activeSkill.description: You launch a continuous pillar of flames forward hitting enemies for 6 seconds, applying Melting: -2.0 armor and 75 damage over 8 seconds every 0.25 seconds to enemies that are caught in its path.

activeSkill.title: Fire Pillar
activeSkill.description: Summons a fire pillar at a random enemy position, dealing 10 damage and applying Melting: -15.0 armor and 500 damage over 8 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Fire Slash
activeSkill.description: Sends a fiery slash forward, causing 50 damage and applying 1 stacks of Burn: 170 damage over 8 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Combustion
activeSkill.description: You emit an aura of fire for 6 seconds, applying 1 stacks of Burn: 70 damage over 8 seconds to enemies that stay near you every 0.5 seconds

activeSkill.title: Fiery Missiles
activeSkill.description: While attack is channeled, you automatically launch fiery missiles that seek 3 random targets, dealing 5 damage and applying 1 stacks of Burn: 40 damage over 8 seconds in a tiny area.

activeSkill.title: Lightning Bolt
activeSkill.description: Fires 3 lightning projectiles towards a random enemy, piercing through enemies in a line, each causing 700 damage and inflicting 10% Dazed.

activeSkill.title: Thunder Clap
activeSkill.description: Hit the ground in front of you calling a thunder strike, dealing 1100 damage and applying 2 seconds Stun and 15% Disoriented.

activeSkill.title: Thunder Strike
activeSkill.description: Calls down thunder to strike a random enemy, dealing 1300 damage and pushing enemies back, inflicting 20% Dazed and 4 seconds Stun.

activeSkill.title: Chain Lightning
activeSkill.description: Hurls a lightning bolt at a random enemy, causing 400 damage, applying 10% Dazed and then jumping to 7 additional nearby targets if possible.

activeSkill.title: Call Lightning
activeSkill.description: Summon a total of 7 lightning strikes away from you, that quickly converge to your position, dealing 80 damage and applying 15% Dazed to enemies in their path.

activeSkill.title: Lightning Beam
activeSkill.description: Fire a continuous beam in the direction you are aiming at, dealing up to 300 damage to enemies in the area and quickly applying 1% Dazed.

activeSkill.title: Shadow Bolt
activeSkill.description: Fires 7 shadowy projectiles towards a random enemy, piercing through enemies in a line, inflicting 1 stacks of Doom: 160 delayed damage each.

activeSkill.title: Shadow Spike
activeSkill.description: Shadow spikes are summoned from the ground in a straight line towards a random enemy, causing 230 damage and applying Doom: 350 delayed damage.

activeSkill.title: Void
activeSkill.description: Creates a void at a random position that pulls enemies in a large area towards it position for 6 seconds, applying 1 stacks of Doom: 240 delayed damage. The pull is not effective against very heavy enemies.

activeSkill.title: Shadow Orb
activeSkill.description: Launch a large orb in the direction you are aiming at, which applies 1 stacks of Cursed: 200 delayed area damage to targets it passes through. Additionally, this orb quickly fires additional projectiles in all directions, each dealing 50 damage per hit.

activeSkill.title: Shadow Step
activeSkill.description: Create a dark portal in front of you and another a few meters away from you, allowing you to teleport from one portal to the other at any time, dealing 300 damage and applying Hemorrhage: 750 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement to enemies near the portal you come out of. Both portals are consumed in the process.

activeSkill.title: Skeletal Mage
activeSkill.description: Summon 1 skeletal mage to fight for you. A maximum of 4 Skeletal Mages can be active at any time.

activeSkill.title: Skeletal Archers
activeSkill.description: Summon 2 skeletal archers to fight for you. A maximum of 4 Skeletal Archers can be active at any time.

activeSkill.title: Shadow Grasp
activeSkill.description: Pulls enemies in a large area towards you, applying Cursed: 150 delayed area damage.

activeSkill.title: Shadow Nova
activeSkill.description: Creates a shadow nova around you, which heals allies for 25 health and applies Doom: 400 delayed damage on enemies in a large area.

activeSkill.title: Ray of Doom
activeSkill.description: Summon 2 shadow rays that rotate around you for 6 seconds, applying 1 stacks of Doom: 150 delayed damage to enemies hit.

activeSkill.title: Skeletal Warriors
activeSkill.description: Summon 3 skeletal warriors to fight for you. A maximum of 12 Skeletal Warriors can be active at any time.

activeSkill.title: Obliterate
activeSkill.description: Obliterate targets in the direction you are aiming at, causing 150 damage and applying 9% Weakness.

activeSkill.title: Heroic Strike
activeSkill.description: Slow attack that strikes targets in a large area in the direction you are aiming at, causing 650 damage and applying Confused: -5% chance to hit and 50% chance to take 500 damage when attacking, for 5 seconds on enemies hit. x3 critical damage.

activeSkill.title: Light Beam
activeSkill.description: Fire a continuous beam in the direction you are aiming at, dealing up to 280 damage to enemies in the area and quickly applying Brittle: +1% cooldowns and 1 damage per hit for 5 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Might
activeSkill.description: Empower you and all your nearby allies, increasing the damage modifier by an additional 50% for 10.0 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Smite
activeSkill.description: Smite enemies at a random location after 3 seconds with holy light, dealing 450 damage to enemies and healing 5 health to allies.

activeSkill.title: Beacon of Light
activeSkill.description: You emit a blessed aura for 6 seconds, causing 80 damage and applying Confused: -1.0% chance to hit and 50% chance to take 20 damage when attacking, for 5 seconds to enemies that stay near you every 0.5 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Exorcism
activeSkill.description: Expel a wave of light around you, dealing 300 damage and healing yourself for 0.5 for each enemy hit.

activeSkill.title: Templar's Verdict
activeSkill.description: Inflict your judgement at a random enemy's position, causing 480 damage to enemies in the area. Damage is multiplied by 3 on critical strikes.

activeSkill.title: Blades of Light
activeSkill.description: You slash forward two times, causing a total of 180 damage and applying 4% Dazed for each hit.

activeSkill.title: Holy Fire
activeSkill.description: You launch 3 waves of holy fire in the direction you are aiming at, each causing 500 damage to enemies in a straight line, transforming all stacks of Dazed into Disoriented. Damage is multiplied by 3 on critical strikes.

activeSkill.title: Bladestorm
activeSkill.description: Spin your weapon around you for a few seconds, hitting enemies all around you a total of 20 times, dealing 60 damage per hit.

activeSkill.title: Subdue
activeSkill.description: A powerful strike in the direction you are aiming at, dealing 50 damage and an extra 10 damage per stack of Bleed or Hemorrhage in the affected targets, applying 12% Fragility.

activeSkill.title: Titan's Cleaver
activeSkill.description: Slash enemies in front of you dealing 350 damage. Damage is multiplied by (1 + 2 x Armor Power bonus).

activeSkill.title: Scent of Blood
activeSkill.description: Increases your cast frequency modifier by an additional 10%, and an extra 1% for each stack of Bleed or Hemorrhage on nearby enemies for 10 seconds. The extra cast frequency modifier cannot exceed 200%.

activeSkill.title: Savage Strike
activeSkill.description: Perform a massive strike in front of you dealing 4000 damage divided equally among all enemies hit.

activeSkill.title: Whirlwind
activeSkill.description: You spin with your weapons, causing 140 damage to all enemies around you.

activeSkill.title: Double Slash
activeSkill.description: You slash forward two times, causing a total of 80 damage and applying 2 stacks of Bleed: 100 damage over 10 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Throw Axe
activeSkill.description: Throws an axe forward hitting enemies in a line, and then coming back to your current position, causing 100 damage and applying 2 stacks of Hemorrhage: 300 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement every time it goes through enemies.

activeSkill.title: Uppercut
activeSkill.description: Throw enemies in the direction you are aiming at in the air, causing 400 damage and inflicting 5 seconds Stun and Wound.

activeSkill.title: Flurry
activeSkill.description: Quickly throw daggers in the direction you are aiming at, hitting enemies total of 20 times, dealing 40 damage and applying 2 stacks of Bleed: 60 damage over 10 seconds with every hit.

activeSkill.title: Quick Strike
activeSkill.description: Perform a quick strike in front of you dealing 90 damage. Damage is multiplied by (1 + 2 x Movement Speed bonus)

activeSkill.title: Piercing Shout
activeSkill.description: Weakens all nearby enemies, reducing their armor power by 50 for 5.0 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Backstab
activeSkill.description: Stab enemies in front of you, causing 300 damage. Damage is multiplied by 5 and you also apply Hemorrhage: 800 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement if you are behind the target.

activeSkill.title: Rupture
activeSkill.description: Hit enemies in a long line in front of you, dealing 500 damage and applying 15% Disoriented and 4 seconds Stun. Can stun most elite enemies.

activeSkill.title: Sinister Strike
activeSkill.description: Stab enemies in front of you, causing 70 damage if the target is facing you, or applying 10 stacks of Hemorrhage: 300 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement if you are behind the target.

activeSkill.title: Eviscerate
activeSkill.description: You strike enemies in front of you, dealing 80 damage and applying 5 stacks of Bleed: 100 damage over 10 seconds if they are facing you, or dealing 250 damage and an extra 50 damage per stack of Bleed or Hemorrhage in the target and removing those effects in the process if you are behind their backs.

activeSkill.title: Intimidating Shout
activeSkill.description: Weakens all nearby enemies, subtracting 60% from their damage modifier for 8 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Shield Wall
activeSkill.description: Empower you and all your nearby allies, increasing your armor power by 200 for 4.0 seconds

activeSkill.title: Storm of Spears
activeSkill.description: Quickly spin around for a few seconds firing a total of 100 spears in all directions, each piercing enemies and dealing 50 damage and applying Hemorrhage: 300 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement.

activeSkill.title: Thrust
activeSkill.description: Hit enemies in a long line in front of you dealing 90 damage and applying 4 stacks of Bleed: 120 damage over 10 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Shield Bash
activeSkill.description: Thrust your shield forward, dealing 500 damage. Damage is multiplied by (1 + 2 x Armor Power bonus).

activeSkill.title: Body Slam
activeSkill.description: Slam your body into the enemies in front of you dealing 500 damage. Damage is multiplied by (1 + 2 x Max HP bonus)

activeSkill.title: Demolish
activeSkill.description: Hit the ground in front of you, dealing 300 damage and sending 10 shockwaves in random directions, each dealing 100 damage and applying Hemorrhage: 150 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement

activeSkill.title: Shockwave
activeSkill.description: Hit the ground causing a shockwave in a line in front of you, causing 250 damage and applying Hemorrhage: 300 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement.

activeSkill.title: Shockwave Totem
activeSkill.description: Summon a ground shaking totem at your position for 20 seconds, which continuously fires shockwaves at the nearest enemy, dealing 100 damage and applying Hemorrhage: 200 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement in a large area. A maximum of 4 totems may be active at any one time.

activeSkill.title: Stomp
activeSkill.description: You stomp the ground, causing 400 damage and applying +9% Fragility and 4 seconds Stun to all enemies around you.

activeSkill.title: Ground Slam
activeSkill.description: Hit the ground with a powerful strike in the direction you are aiming at, causing 300 damage, applying Bleed: 500 damage over 10 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Bladed Chakram
activeSkill.description: Throw a chakram in the target direction, causing 120 damage and applying Rot: 450 damage over 15 seconds, spread on death to targets hit. The chakram returns to you at the end of its range, causing damage to enemies again on its way back.

activeSkill.title: Build Ballista
activeSkill.description: Build a ballista at your position for 25 seconds, which quickly fires bolts at the nearest enemy, dealing 120 damage. A maximum of 4 ballistas can be active at any given time.

activeSkill.title: Frag Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires a shot in the direction you are aiming at, piercing through enemies in a line, dealing 250 damage. Two secondary bolts are released on impact, each dealing another 150 damage and applying 3% Fragility.

activeSkill.title: Storm of Arrows
activeSkill.description: Quickly spin around for a few seconds firing a total of 100 arrows in all directions, each piercing enemies and dealing 200 damage.

activeSkill.title: Split Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires a projectile in the direction you are aiming at, that explodes on impact releasing 10 projectiles, each dealing 70 damage and applying Bleed: 250 damage over 10 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Sniper Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires a shot in the direction you are aiming at, causing 380 damage. Damage is multiplied by 5 on critical strikes.

activeSkill.title: Ricochet Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires a ricocheting shot in the direction you are aiming at, that bounces around between targets until it has traveled a total of 60 meters, dealing 100 damage every time it hits an enemy.

activeSkill.title: Shoot
activeSkill.description: Fires 3 arrows in the direction you are aiming at, dealing 50 damage to all enemies hit and applying 3% Fragility for each arrow.

activeSkill.title: Rain of Arrows
activeSkill.description: Shoots multiple arrows at a random enemy's location, hitting enemies multiple times, causing a total of 560 damage and applying 3 seconds Stun with every hit.

activeSkill.title: Spread Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires 10 arrows in a short range with a large spread in the direction you are aiming at, dealing 40 damage per arrow.

activeSkill.title: Bomb Barrage
activeSkill.description: Fires 10 bombs in an area in front of you, each causing 85 damage and applying 3% Weakness.

activeSkill.title: Cluster Bomb
activeSkill.description: Throw a bomb in front of you, dealing 300 damage in an area and exploding into 20 smaller bombs, each dealing 150 damage.

activeSkill.title: Shrapnel Bomb
activeSkill.description: Throw a bomb in front of you, dealing 270 damage in an area and exploding into 15 projectiles that fly in all directions, each dealing 45 damage and applying Bleed: 80 damage over 10 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Suction Bomb
activeSkill.description: Throw a bomb in front of you pulling enemies in a large area towards its position, causing 220 damage.

activeSkill.title: Weakening Grenade
activeSkill.description: Throws a grenade in an area in front of you, causing 350 damage and applying 24% Weakness.

activeSkill.title: Bear Trap
activeSkill.description: Leave a permanent trap in the ground that explodes when an enemy steps on it, causing 500 damage and applying 60% Slow and Wound to enemies in a large area.

activeSkill.title: Shrapnel Mine
activeSkill.description: Leave a permanent mine in the ground that explodes when an enemy steps on it, exploding into 20 fragments that fly in all direction, each applying 5 stacks of Hemorrhage: 130 damage over 10 seconds, and extra damage from movement.

activeSkill.title: Mortar Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires 5 mortar shots in an area in front of you, each causing 30 damage and applying 1 stacks of Bleed: 60 damage over 10 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Disengage
activeSkill.description: Throw an icy bomb right in front of you, dealing 450 damage and applying 20 stacks of Paralysis: -100% movement speed, +20% direct damage taken to enemies, pushing them away.

activeSkill.title: Explosive Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires an explosive shot in the direction you are aiming at, dealing 250 damage and applying 12% Weakness to enemies in large area.

activeSkill.title: Shrapnel Shot
activeSkill.description: Fires 8 projectiles in the direction you are aiming at, each exploding on contact into 5 smaller projectiles that deal 80 damage each.

activeSkill.title: Napalm Blast
activeSkill.description: Fires a blast of fire in a cone in front of you, causing 40 damage, applying Melting: -12.0 armor and 400 damage over 8 seconds and leaving a burning area in the ground that continuously applies Melting: -1.0 armor to enemies.

activeSkill.title: Power Blast
activeSkill.description: Fires a powerful blast in a line in front of you, causing 150 damage and applying 10% Disoriented.

activeSkill.title: Freezing Blow
activeSkill.description: Fires a freezing blow in a cone in front of you, causing 500 damage and transforming all stacks of Slow into Paralysis.

activeSkill.title: Ancient Curse
activeSkill.description: Fires a shadowy blast in a cone in front of you, causing 200 damage and applying Doom: 300 delayed damage to enemies, and increasing the cast frequency of allies by an additional 50% for 12.0 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Buckshot
activeSkill.description: Fires a blast of pellets in a cone in front of you, causing 100 damage and applying 3% Fragility.

activeSkill.title: Summon Helper Elves
activeSkill.description: Summon 3 helper elves to fight for you. A maximum of 6 units can be active at any time

activeSkill.title: Surprise Gift
activeSkill.description: Leave a permanent gift on the ground that opens when an enemy steps on it, cause 600 damage to nearby enemies and firing 6 bombs that splut on impact, each causing 400 damage and applying Paralysis.

activeSkill.title: Avalanche
activeSkill.description: Fires 25 snowballs in an area in front of you over 3 seconds, each causing 90 damage and applying Slow.

activeSkill.title: Smoke Bomb
activeSkill.description: Throws a bomb at a random enemy, applying Distracted, Slow and enveloping the area in smoke for 6 seconds, causing all your attacks on enemies inside the area to be considered as attacks from behind.

activeSkill.title: Aura of Chaos
activeSkill.description: You emit an aura of chaos for 6 seconds, causing random damage between 1 and 80 and applying a random powerful Negative effect to enemies that stay near you every 0.5 seconds.

activeSkill.title: Reap
activeSkill.description: Slashes target in the direction you are aiming at, causing all Doom and Cursed stacks in the area to deal 200% of their damage instantly, removing the effects in the process.

activeSkill.title: Summon Infantry
activeSkill.description: Summon 6 powerful legionnaires to fight for you for 20,0 seconds, which applying Dazed when they attack. A maximum of 6 units can be active at any time.

activeSkill.title: Penance
activeSkill.description: Hurls a holy bolt at a random enemy, causing 200 damage, applying Disoriented and then jumping to 8 additional nearby targets if possible.

activeSkill.title: Hammer of Justice
activeSkill.description: Throws a fast hammer forward hitting enemies in a line, and then coming back to your current position, causing 140 damage every time it goes through enemies. Damage is multiplies by 3 on critical strikes.

activeSkill.title: Seeking Chaos
activeSkill.description: While the attack is channeled, you automatically launch 2 chaotic missiles that seek random targets, dealing random damage between 1 and 140 and applying random powerful Negative effect.

activeSkill.title: Wild Strike
activeSkill.description: Strike enemies in front of you, dealing 300 damage and an extra 20% damage per summoned unit you control.

activeSkill.title: Twin Daggers
activeSkill.description: You slash forward two times, causing a total of 100 damage and applying Weakness. Damage is multiplied by 5 if you are behind your target.

activeSkill.title: Severe Cold
activeSkill.description: Fires a ricocheting shot in the direction you are aiming at, that bounces around between targets until it has traveled a total of 60 meters, dealing 60 damage and applying Slow every time it hits an enemy.

activeSkill.title: Jupiter's Spear
activeSkill.description: You strike enemies in fron of you, dealing 50 damage and creating a maximum of 4 lightning bolts that jump to 3 additional nearby targets causing 130 damage and applying Dazed if possible.

activeSkill.title: Unholy Bolt
activeSkill.description: Fires a shadowy projectile in the direction you are aiming at, piercing through enemies in a line, causing 200 damage and inflicting Doom on enemies and healing 10 health on allies.

activeSkill.title: Unholy Aura
activeSkill.description: You emit a shadowy aura for 6 seconds, applying Doom to enemies that stay near you every 0,5 seconds.
